Plate Diameter/thickness:

Rogue Calibrated KG Steel Plates


25kg   = 450mm/27mm 
20kg   = 450mm/22.5mm (1:1.2)
15kg   = 400mm/21mm (1.125:1.2857142857142857142857142857143)
10kg   = 325mm/21mm (1.3846153846153846153846153846154:1.2857142857142857142857142857143)
5kg    = 228mm/21.5mm (1.9736842105263157894736842105263:1.2558139534883720930232558139535)
2.5kg  = 190mm/16mm (2.3684210526315789473684210526316:1.6875)
1.25kg = 160mm/12mm (2.8125:2.25)
0.5kg  = 134mm/8mm (3.3582089552238805970149253731343:3.375)
0.25kg = 112mm/6mm (4.0178571428571428571428571428571:4.5)

Rogue Calibrated LB Steel Plates

55lb   = 450mm/27mm
45lb   = 450mm/22mm (1:1.2272727272727272727272727272727)
35lb   = 400mm/21mm (1.125:1.2857142857142857142857142857143)
25lb   = 325mm/23mm (1.384615384615385:1.173913043478261)
10lb   = 228mm/19mm (1.973684210526316:1.421052631578947)
5lb    = 190mm/14.5mm (2.368421052631579:1.862068965517241)
2.5lb  = 160mm/10mm (2.8125:2.7)
1lb    = 134mm/7mm (3.358208955223881:3.857142857142857)
0.5lb  = 112mm/5.5mm (4.017857142857143:4.909090909090909)
0.25lb = 90mm/4.5mm (5:6)



Standard Barbell Measurements

Bar diameter - 28mm/1.1 inches (on Average)
Sleeve diameter - 50.8mm/2 inches (Standard Olympic Bar)
